Psychology     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Psychology      Psychology   Main Menu    People           Faculty    By Program    Administration    Graduate Students    Research Associate    Staff         Academics           Graduate Studies    Undergraduate Studies         Courses           Academic Catalog    Syllabi    Archived Syllabi         Research           Behavioral Neuroscience    Clinical    Cognitive    Community and Prevention Research    Social and Personality         DIVERSITY           Mission Statement    Diversity Advancement Committee    Programs and Initiatives    Faculty Research    Resources         CLINIC    DEPARTMENT           Contact Us    News    Calendar    Human Subjects    Statistics and Methods Clinic    Support    Intranet    Online Teaching Resources          Eyebrow menu    las.uic.edu    +Give    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      DIVERSITY      View Menu               Diversity      In these sections on Diversity, you can find out about diversity-related initiatives within our department .  Many of these initiatives spring from the Diversity Advancement Committee (DAC) , which is a branch of the department devoted to promoting diversity, and fostering an environment of respect and inclusion for all members of our community.  Since we are a research institution, many of our faculty are involved in active research that directly relates to diversity. See the Faculty Research page to learn more about this exciting work.  Overall, our focus on diversity and inclusion springs directly from our Mission Statement  .
